div.p: MUCH BETTER THAN A TIE WITH GEESE ON IT.
GOOD CHOICE. >>> FINALLY, FACTOR TIP OF THE
DAY, MIKE HICKS, COUNT YOUR BLESSINGS, AFTER THE INTERVIEW
WITH THE PRESIDENT, AT LEAST YOU WEREN’T CALLED A RACIST.
>> OH, BUT I WAS, MIKE. TOO FAR DOWN IN THE GUTTER, BUT
THERE IS A TIP ATTACHED TO IT, IF ANYONE EVER CALLS YOU GUYS A
RACIST OR BRANDS OTHERS THAT WAY WITHOUT SOLID PROOF, NEVER SPEAK
TO THAT PERSON AGAIN, NEVER. WALK AWAY FOREVER.
SOME PEOPLE ARE SIMPLY NOT WORTH YOUR TIME.
IT’S A DIGNITY QUESTION. FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY, THAT IS
IT FOR US TONIGHT. PLEASE CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS
WEBSITE WHICH IS DIFFERENT FROM BILLO’REILLY.COM.
